title: 726 98 "Fourth Gear! The Phenomenal Bounce-man!"Transliteration: "Gia Fōsu! Kyōi no Baundo-man!" (Japanese:ギア4！驚異のバウンドマン！) Toshinori Fukuzawa Jin Tanaka January 17, 2016(2016-01-17) May 18, 2025
transformers_text: 726 98 Fourth Gear The Phenomenal Bounce man Transliteration Gia F su Ky i no Ba undo man Japanese 4 Toshi nori Fuku z awa J in Tanaka January 17 2016 2016 01 17 May 18 2025 As the Birdcage closes in on Dress rosa marines and pirates a like assist the handicapped Sai then orders the Cor rida Colosseum gladiators who are still standing to rescue the fallen and take them out of the plateau Meanwhile Viola Us opp and Hack climb down the King's Plateau and Viola notices that the center of the Birdcage is shifting toward Do flamingo's location meaning even the King's Plateau will be sliced apart At the Flower Field Leo and Man sherry use their abilities to reattach Law's severed arm while Cavendish tells Law that defeating Do flamingo would cause ripples all over the world and Law replies that that is what they were after Back at the palace Luffy activates Gear Fourth Bounce man which causes his torso to balloon and forces him to constantly bounce while also covering his arms legs and upper torso in Armament Hak i Do flamingo laughs at this new form but Luffy retracts his fist into his arm and punches him blowing him into the city far below Luffy follows using elastic force from his legs to fly and lands more large blows on Do flamingo as the Warlord struggles to keep on even footing However Luffy absorbs Do flamingo's attacks due to his body being rubbery despite being armored and continuously stretching his arms while also changing the direction of his punches
tf_idf_text: fourth gear phenomenal bounce man transliteration gia undo man japanese toshi nori fuku awa tanaka january may birdcage close dress rosa marine pirate like assist handicap sai order cor rida colosseum gladiator still stand rescue fallen take plateau meanwhile viola opp hack climb king plateau viola notice center birdcage shift toward flamingos location mean even king plateau slice apart flower field leo man sherry use ability reattach law sever arm cavendish tell law defeat flamingo would cause ripple world law reply back palace luffy activates gear fourth bounce man cause torso balloon force constantly bounce also cover arm legs upper torso armament hak flamingo laugh new form luffy retracts fist arm punch blow city far luffy follow use elastic force leg fly land large blow flamingo warlord struggle keep even foot however luffy absorbs flamingos attack due body rubbery despite armored continuously stretch arm also change direction punch
